title: Sacred Space in Secular Terms
description:
Sacred spaces are not arbitrary, but are rather constructed in a particular way which show us what they are and also show us how space itself can become a specific place, a "here" which becomes the reference for identity.  

This talk was given at the Northwest Catholic Family Education Center on October 27-28, 2017 with Jordan Peterson and other speakers.  http://nwcatholicconference.com/

Sacred Art in Secular Terms
https://youtu.be/oUcdDfmjoTQ

Jordan Peterson's return on the notion of sacred space
https://youtu.be/DRJKwDfDbco

Jordan Peterson says you should go to church
https://youtu.be/f70hae63YbI

My carving workshop
http://www.hexaemeron.org/carving

Support this channel:
patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
paypal: https://www.paypal.me/JonathanPageau

website: http://www.pageaucarvings.com
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/jonathanpageau
twitter: https://twitter.com/pageaujonathan
